USE logical_DWH_nyc_taxi;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.reporting_table_proc
    @year VARCHAR(5),
    @month VARCHAR(3)

AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_statement NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_statement NVARCHAR(MAX);

    -- Drop statement to remove existing reporting table if it exists
    SET @drop_statement = 
        'IF OBJECT_ID(''gold.reporting_table_' + @year + '_' + @month + ''') IS NOT NULL ' +
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.reporting_table_' + @year + '_' + @month + ';';

    PRINT(@drop_statement);
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_statement;

    -- Create statement for the new reporting table
    SET @create_statement = 
        'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.reporting_table_' + @year + '_' + @month + ' ' +
        'WITH ( ' +
        '    LOCATION = ''gold_layer/reporting_data/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''', ' +
        '    DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS, ' +
        '    FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file ' +
        ') AS ' +
        'SELECT ' +
        '    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, ' +
        '    CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) AS trip_date, ' +
        '    tz.Borough, ' +
        '    cl.day_name AS trip_day, ' +
        '    CASE WHEN cl.day_name IN (''Saturday'', ''Sunday'') THEN ''Y'' ELSE ''N'' END AS weekend_ind, ' +
        '    SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc = ''Credit card'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS card_trips_count, ' +
        '    SUM(CASE WHEN pt.payment_type_desc = ''Cash'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cash_trips_count ' +
        'FROM ' +
        '    silver.view_partitioning_trip_data vtrip ' +
        '    JOIN silver.taxi_zones tz ON vtrip.PULocationID = tz.LocationID ' +
        '    JOIN silver.calendar cl ON CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime) = cl.date ' +
        '    JOIN silver.payment_type pt ON vtrip.payment_type = pt.payment_type ' +
        'WHERE vtrip.year = ''' + @year + ''' AND vtrip.month = ''' + @month + ''' ' +
        'GROUP BY ' +
        '    vtrip.year, vtrip.month, ' +
        '    CONVERT(DATE, vtrip.lpep_pickup_datetime), ' +
        '    tz.Borough, ' +
        '    cl.day_name;';

    PRINT(@create_statement);
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_statement;
END;
